item.title: Readme
item.description: Amanda.org is an open source site. Please refer the TO DO LIST to contribute to this site. Amanda (The Advanced Maryland Automatic Network Disk Archiver) Backup Software Copyright © 1991-1998 University of Maryland at College Park All Rights Reserved. PLEASE NOTE: THIS SOFTWARE IS BEING MADE AVAILABLE “AS-IS”. We make no warranties that it will work for you. As such there is no support available other than users helping each other on the Amanda mailing lists or forums.
